KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Antirequisite
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add courses that, if completed, would prevent a student from enrolling in this course.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Corequisite
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add conditions that will restrict student enrollment, addressing restrictions to majors, locations, credit level requirements, etc. or Add courses, with or without grade requirements, which a student must have completed in order to enroll.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Student Eligibilities + Prerequisite
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add conditions that will restrict student enrollment, addressing restrictions to majors, locations, credit level requirements, etc. or Add courses, with or without grade requirements, which a student must have completed in order to enroll.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Courses that Restrict Credit
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment in or completion of another course that will restrict the credits to be awarded.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Recommended Preparation
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: The courses and/or preparation added here will not prevent students from registering, but will be printed in the catalog.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Completion Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add conditions that will define how students may successfully complete this program.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Entrance Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add conditions that will restrict student entrance into this program.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Satisfactory Progress Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Add conditions that will define how students will maintain satisfactory standing in this program.
